title: IT'S A SIGN!!! ...or is it?
body:
I think my RP just told me that it wants to stay where it is the whole next year!!!
I wonder if i can do that!
Maybe it's the new years resolution i am going to break?!
What do you guys think? RP spending hiatus, yes or no?!?

replies.body: I think it means you are supposed to spend it all on New Year's Eve.

> [{quoted}](name=Bark Wahlberg,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=QjGjwyTL,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2014-12-18T06:07:25.560+0000)
>
> I think it means you are supposed to spend it all on New Year's Eve.

New Years Eve skin confirmed

> [{quoted}](name=HeadCrusher135,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=QjGjwyTL,comment-id=00030001,timestamp=2014-12-18T08:10:58.457+0000)
>
> New Years Eve skin confirmed

PLEEEEEAAAASE!!!!!!!!

> [{quoted}](name=Bark Wahlberg,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=QjGjwyTL,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2014-12-18T06:07:25.560+0000)
>
> I think it means you are supposed to spend it all on New Year's Eve.

Wow, that totally makes sense!
Thank you for the clarification, I shall act on your advice immediately!

I think it's saying NEVER BUY ANYTHING AGAIN ;)

nah. Skins and stuff are always fun to have... cause they make so many cool things

54367

Wow, that is to perfect to ignore I'd say.  It pleases every bit of OCD in me.
